Key Match Events: Oman Vs Papua New Guinea will be the first match of the ICC T20 World Cup which will be played at this venue.
Pre-Game Insights: A total of 06 matches will be played at this venue.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The stadium will have a capacity of 3,000 people only.
The price for the Oman Stadium Ticket is 26.41 USD.
The price for the Zayed Cricket Stadium Ticket is 21.05 USD.
The price for the Sharjah Cricket Stadium Ticket is 08.42 USD.
The price for the Dubai International Stadium Ticket is 21.05 USD.
Others: The stadium will also host T20I matches.
